alert.note: Alert for Gage; Pawnee (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 10:15PM CDT until June 08 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR WESTERN PAWNEE AND CENTRAL GAGE COUNTIES... At 1014 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northwest of Holmesville, or 3 miles southeast of Beatrice, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Wymore, Blue Springs and Virginia around 1025 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Barneston, Burchard, Liberty and Summerfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
